mapper.select:
select * from (select b.ID,b.STTP,b.LGTD,b.LTTD,b.STNM,b.STCD, (select case ad_lv when 5 then AD_NM when 6 then (select AD_NM from WRP_AD_B sub where sub.ad_cd=m.UP_ADCD)+'|'+AD_NM end from WRP_AD_B m where AD_CD=ADDVCD) as AD_NM , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by p desc) AS RowId from (select * from ST_STBPRP_B where STTP='PQ') b left join (select stcd,sum(p) as p from ST_HP_C where DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111)) >='${Time_min}' and DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111))<='${Time_max}' group by stcd ) c on b.STCD=c.STCD left join ST_RSVR_R1 r on b.STCD=r.STCD left join ST_RSV_Alarm a on r.STCD=a.STCD inner join ST_StationStatus_R s on b.STCD=s.STCD left join ST_StationStatusType t on s.VOLTYPE=t.VOLTYPE
b.stnm like '%'+#{STNM}+'%'
and
b.addvcd like #{ADDVCD}+'%'
and b.STGR in (${STGR})
and p >= #{P}
and r.level in (${LEVEL})
and cs=1 and vol >=t.VOLMIN and vol <=t.VOLMAX
and (vol <t.VOLMIN or vol >t.VOLMAX)
and (cs=0 or cs is null)
and (cs=0 or cs is null or vol <t.VOLMIN or vol >t.VOLMAX)
) as b

select w.STCD,w.DAMCD,w.MPCD,CONVERT(varchar(16), l.MSTM, 120) as MSTM,l.SPPRWL,l.TM,y.SPPRWL as WLYZ,(l.SPPRWL-y.SPPRWL) as WLJYZ from WRP_SPG_SPQNMP w inner join WRP_SPG_LSY y on w.MPCD=y.MPCD inner join WRP_SPG_SPPR_L1 l on w.MPCD=l.MPCD
w.STCD in
#{STCD}
order by w.STCD asc,WLJYZ desc

select w.STCD,w.DAMCD,r.MPCD,CONVERT(varchar(16), r.MSTM, 120) as MSTM,r.SPPRWM,r.TM,w.PZTBTEL as PZYZ,(r.SPPRWM-w.PZTBTEL) as PZJYZ from WRP_SPG_PZTB w inner join WRP_SPG_SPPR1 r on w.MPCD=r.MPCD
w.STCD in
#{STCD}
order by w.STCD,PZJYZ desc

select w.STCD,w.DAMCD,w.MPCD,w.XYHRDS,CONVERT(varchar(16), s.MSTM, 120) as MSTM,case when s.XHRDS>=0 then '向下游'+convert(varchar(20),ABS(s.XHRDS)) else '向上游'+convert(varchar(20),ABS(s.XHRDS)) end as XHRDS,(ABS(s.XHRDS)-w.XYHRDS) as XJYZ,case when s.YHRDS>=0 then '向左岸'+convert(varchar(20),ABS(s.YHRDS)) else '向右岸'+convert(varchar(20),ABS(s.YHRDS)) end as YHRDS,(ABS(s.YHRDS)-w.XYHRDS) as YJYZ,((ABS(s.XHRDS)-w.XYHRDS)+(ABS(s.YHRDS)-w.XYHRDS)) as ORDERBY from WRP_DFR_SRHRDSMP w inner join WRP_DFR_SRHRDS1 s on w.MPCD=s.MPCD
w.STCD in
#{STCD}
order by w.STCD,ORDERBY desc

select w.STCD,w.DAMCD,w.MPCD,w.VRDS as VRDSYJ,v.INEL,CONVERT(varchar(16), v.MSTM, 120) as MSTM,case when v.VRDS>=0 then '下沉'+convert(varchar(20),ABS(v.VRDS)) else '抬升'+convert(varchar(20),ABS(v.VRDS)) end as VRDS,(ABS(v.VRDS)-w.VRDS) as VJYZ from WRP_DFR_SRVRDSMP w inner join WRP_DFR_SRVRDS1 v on w.MPCD=v.MPCD
w.STCD in
#{STCD}
order by w.STCD,VJYZ desc

select count(*) as TOTAL,sum(case when b.yjval>0 then 1 else 0 end) as YJNUM from (select w.STCD,sum(case when(l.SPPRWL-s.SPPRWL)>=0 then 1 else 0 end) as yjval from WRP_SPG_SPPR_L1 l inner join WRP_SPG_SPQNMP w on l.MPCD=w.MPCD inner join WRP_SPG_LSY s on l.MPCD=s.MPCD group by w.STCD) as b

select count(*) as TOTAL,sum(case when b.yjval>0 then 1 else 0 end) as YJNUM from (select w.STCD,sum(case when (l.SPPRWM-w.PZTBTEL)>=0 then 1 else 0 end) as yjval from WRP_SPG_SPPR1 l inner join WRP_SPG_PZTB w on l.MPCD=w.MPCD group by w.STCD) as b

select count(*) as TOTAL,sum(case when b.yjval>0 then 1 else 0 end) as YJNUM from (select w.STCD,sum(case when (ABS(s.XHRDS)-w.XYHRDS)>=0 or (ABS(s.YHRDS)-w.XYHRDS)>=0 then 1 else 0 end) as yjval from WRP_DFR_SRHRDS1 s inner join WRP_DFR_SRHRDSMP w on s.MPCD=w.MPCD group by w.STCD) as b

select count(*) as TOTAL,sum(case when b.yjval>0 then 1 else 0 end) as YJNUM from (select w.STCD,sum(case when (ABS(s.VRDS)-w.VRDS)>=0 then 1 else 0 end) as yjval from WRP_DFR_SRVRDS1 s inner join WRP_DFR_SRVRDSMP w on s.MPCD=w.MPCD group by w.STCD) as b
